name: Pacific Takedown
description:
NOTE: This is a proof of concept/demo and not a finished game. We recommend downloading the game entirely since it runs a little better! - SMASH THE BOTS. DESTROY THE CORP. CLIMB THE TOWER. In an alternate future, megacorporation Pacific has taken control of the world. Its robots now occupy the home and patrol the streets.  You are a girl gang leader, and you must claim the streets as your own. Armed with a baseball bat, you must ascend Pacific's headquarters, destroy its robots with a swing, and take back your teenage years.

-

Programming by splet

Art and design by frogf and catsket

Music and sound design by Nycelly

Level design by cyan
